>
> >
> > Chief Goonda, man do I how him a dozen or so deaths. Me and a group of
> > friends foolishly tried to take on that ogre camp one night and then
>spent
> > the next 4 hours getting all of our corpses back :) And this was when
> > shamans still had charm. I died 4 times that night, ick.
>
>Rokken, if you want to make a Goonda slaying party some night on Karana, my
>party's all up for it. We have similar scores to settle.
>
>In beta, a friend of mine went after Goonda and their entire party got
>charmed in
>about 15 seconds. The first person to snap out of it did NOT have a long
>life.
>:)
>
>Jyzan of Karana

Groovey :) Gimmie a tell when you want to take the big guy down.
